member.name: T:EPiServer.Social.Ratings.Site.DependencyInitializationModule
member.summary: The DependencyInitializationModule class prepares the dependencies for the services and components supporting the 'Ratings' feature set of the Social platform.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Ratings.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.ConfigureContainer(EPiServer.ServiceLocation.ServiceConfigurationContext)
member.summary: Prepares dependencies for rating services, and registers them with the site's IoC system.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Ratings.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateRatingService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the IRatingService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Rating service intended to support the site

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Ratings.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.CreateRatingStatisticsService
member.summary: Factory method supporting the instantiation of the IRatingStatisticsService implementation intended to support the site.
member.returns: Rating statistics service intended to support the site

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Ratings.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.Initialize(EPiServer.Framework.Initialization.InitializationEngine)
member.summary: Executes the initialization procedure for this module.

member.name: M:EPiServer.Social.Ratings.Site.DependencyInitializationModule.Uninitialize(EPiServer.Framework.Initialization.InitializationEngine)
member.summary: Executes the teardown procedure for this module.
